SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
VISUALFORCE B2B COMMERCE RELEASE NOTES AND UPGRADE GUIDE
Checkout: Deliver an Efficient Buyer Experience

Add powerful checkout capabilities to your customized or headless storefront experience. Give your buyers confidence that their large carts can be placed efficiently and fulfilled successfully.

Optimize Checkout for Large Carts
When a buyer's shopping cart contains a large number of items, efficiently convert the cart to an order and ensure that the buyer's checkout experience is uninterrupted. Even if you don't enable Cart Scale, you can enable asynchronous processing for placing an order during checkout flow.
Extend Checkout Behavior More Easily with New API Methods
Integrate a customized checkout experience with fewer headaches, or add checkout behavior to a headless B2B Commerce for Visualforce solution. This release replaces the ccrz.cc_api_Cart.placeEOrder public method with new extensible, global methods for the ccrz.ccLogicCartPlace logic service provider class.
